thread.title_full: Sania Mirza pulls off super swag in this throwback pic - Sports

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Sania Mirza pulls off super swag in this throwback pic - Sports
text:
Sania Mirza. Pic/ PTI 
India's female tennis star is also known for her fashion sense and different hairdos, besides her skills on the court.
Sania Mirza, who is quite an active sports personality on Instagram, took to the photo sharing site to share a picture as part of the Throwback Thursday theme.
Sania shared a really old pic where she looks really cute sporting a short haircut. Does she intend to go back to that hairstyle? Her posts says so:
  #TB thinking of going back to this hair style ðÂÂÂÂÂÂðÂÂÂÂÂÂit's got some real swag to it ðÂÂÂÂÂÂðÂÂÂÂ¶ðÂÂÂÂ» Photo finding credit - @naazaoosman 
A post shared by Sania Mirza (@mirzasaniar) onFeb 22, 2017 at 1:03pm PST
Do you think Sania Mirza would be able to pull off a similar hair cut currently?
